name: Reggie the Hedgie
description:
Reggie is always running but his world is dangerous! Help him to catch apples, avoiding traps. Reggie can jump, double jump, glide and hang on walls.

Control: Tap to jump ; hold to glide

This game was made for the 1-click microStudio mini-jam hosted by @TinkerSmith! As the game didn't have the HIT in "HIT & RUN", I included a music generator which creates a unique HIT song for every run (using the I-V-VI-IV hit song rule, search Axis of Awesome if you are curious to know more ;-) )
